tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_performance_data (
    employee_id INT,
    performance_rating FLOAT,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceFeedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_employee FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES RemoteEmployees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_performance_data (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performance_rating INT,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    evaluator_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    performance_rating INT,
    comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employee_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceEvaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluation_score INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeePerformanceData(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FactorWeights (
    evaluation_id INT,
    factor_id INT,
    weight DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (evaluation_id) REFERENCES PerformanceEvaluation(evaluation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (factor_id) REFERENCES PerformanceFactors(factor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  rating INT,
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Goals (
  goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  goal_description TEXT,
  deadline DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewer_id INT,
  reviewee_id INT,
  feedback_date DATE,
  comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  meeting_date DATE,
  topic VARCHAR(100),
  duration_minutes INT
);
